title: 100 Classic Oil Paintings
description: Step into a world of elegance and culture with our first edition of 100 Classic Oil Paintings.
longDescription:
Enrich Your Project with Timeless Artistry

Step into a world of elegance and culture with our first edition of 100 Classic Oil Paintings. This carefully curated collection features a diverse array of high-quality artwork, ready to adorn the walls of your game’s most prestigious environments. From the grand halls of virtual museums to the intimate spaces of digital manors, these paintings bring a touch of class to any setting.


Key Features:


  • A vast selection of 100 high-resolution classic oil paintings.
  • Files provided in PNG format, ensuring compatibility with most game engines and design tools.
  • High-definition quality with resolutions suitable for close-up views without losing detail.
  • Effortless integration, with each painting meticulously prepared for drag-and-drop use in your projects.


Perfect for games, these assets can be used to enhance:

  • Luxury estate and mansion settings
  • Museum and gallery simulations
  • Treasure and artifact rooms in adventure and puzzle games
  • Backgrounds for historical or art-themed narratives


We understand the value of your time. That’s why each painting is formatted to ensure a smooth transition into your projects, regardless of the platform. Whether you’re working on a mobile, PC, or console game, integrating these paintings is as simple as importing them into your scene.


As this is the first edition, updates will be determined based on community feedback and demand. We are committed to delivering quality assets and support. Your input is highly valued and will guide future enhancements.


We encourage you to share your experience with our assets. Your ratings and reviews not only help us improve but also assist your fellow creators in making informed decisions.


For support or feedback, please contact us. Your creative journey is important to us, and we look forward to being a part of it.


All images are professionally AI-generated.


Embellish your creations with our collection, where each painting tells a story and adds a layer of depth to your player's experience. Thank you for choosing 100 Classic Oil Paintings. We can’t wait to see the worlds you’ll create.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • A vast selection of 100 high-resolution digital reproductions of classic oil paintings.
  • Files provided in PNG format, ensuring compatibility with most game engines and design tools.
  • High-definition quality with resolutions suitable for close-up views without losing detail.
  • Effortless integration, with each painting meticulously prepared for drag-and-drop use in your projects.


Number of Materials: 100

Texture Resolutions: 2652:1728; 1728:2652; 2048:2048

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
